header.description:
Add-on (RP) by §2Hien Q Le.
Add crafting recipes of Glowing Obsidian and Nether Reactor Core.
Also fix most of the Minecraft Bedrock 1.20.50+ unresolved bugs.
If you want to experience Minecraft 1.21 Update Features, please turn on the §eUpdate 1.21.
header.name: Nether Reactor Core Addon V2024.0 (Resource Pack)
